sql.if:
and(
title like '%' || #{word} || '%'
content like '%' || #{word} || '%'
title like '%' || #{word} || '%' or content like '%' || #{word} || '%'
)

mapper.sql:
and (
startDate <= sysdate and endDate >= trunc(sysdate)
endDate < trunc(sysdate)
startDate > sysdate
1 = 1
)
mapper.insert: insert into notice(no, title, content, startDate, endDate) values (notice_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{startDate}, #{endDate})
